existing_features.title: Add a new, practical test scenario that is clearly related to the app’s keylogger-awareness simulation (e.g., a real-world “public/shared computer login” style scenario) and make it available from the existing “Test Scenarios” panel with working “Run Scenario”, learning content, and quiz support.

Update the scenario runner’s preset text for the newly added scenario to be educational, defensive, and privacy-safe (no real credentials; avoid providing instructions that enable wrongdoing), while still being realistic enough to demonstrate risk scoring/auto-blocking behavior.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add a useful, related 'run scenario' (example scenario/workflow) to the app

projectName: Add a more useful, real-world “Run Scenario” workflow
